title: Ryder Cup 2025: USA 5-12 Europe after Hovland withdraws from singles – live
summary: Scott Murray is providing live updates on the 11 singles matches following Viktor Hovland's withdrawal due to injury. Fans can stay informed on hole-by-hole coverage of the ongoing tournament. Check in for real-time updates and results.

title: Newcastle v Arsenal: Premier League – live
summary: Newcastle faces Mikel Arteta's team in a highly anticipated match, aiming to continue their strong recent performance. The game promises to be an exciting showdown between two ambitious sides. Rob Smyth will provide a comprehensive minute-by-minute report of the action.

title: David Killick obituary
summary: The actor, renowned for a 60-year career, contributed to prestigious institutions like the Royal Shakespeare Company and the National Theatre. He also appeared in beloved television series, including A Touch of Frost. His legacy is marked by significant achievements in both theater and television.

title: Starmer calls Reform’s policy on immigration ‘racist’ and says Farage’s party would ‘tear country apart’ – Labour conference live
summary: The Prime Minister condemned the Reform party's policy as immoral, while acknowledging that voters drawn to the party are not inherently racist but rather expressing their frustration. He emphasized the need to address the underlying issues driving this discontent among the electorate. The remarks highlight the complex dynamics of political sentiment and voter motivations.

title: Why Britain must not get taken in by Dubai’s skin-deep glitz | Letters
summary: Readers expressed their opinions on Jonathan Liew's article regarding Reform UK's admiration for the emirate. The letters highlight differing perspectives on the political implications of this admiration. Overall, the responses reflect a mix of support and criticism of the party's stance.
